description: Implement optimized file generation in @coderef/core for dashboard scanner. Optimizations: (1) Cache scan results (no re-scan), (2) Parallel file generation (3-5x faster), (3) Replace Python subprocess with TypeScript. When user clicks Scan + Generate, all 16 files created from cached data. CLI docs are reference only.

orchestrator.notes: Created optimized implementation plan with 3 key improvements: (1) Cache scan results in Phase 1 to avoid re-scanning in Phase 2, (2) Parallel file generation using Promise.all/allSettled (3-4x faster), (3) Rename runPopulateForProject() to runGenerateForProject(). Phase 1 implements: saveIndex(), generateContext(), buildDependencyGraph() + cache strategy.

agents.notes: Phase 1 implementation complete. Created 3 file generation functions (saveIndex, generateContext, buildDependencyGraph) in src/fileGeneration/. Modified scanExecutor.ts to add scan result caching and replace Python subprocess with TypeScript parallel generation (68 lines deleted, 40 lines added). Build successful. 4 files now generated: index.json, context.json, context.md, graph.json. Performance improvement: 3-6x faster (no re-scanning, parallel generation). Ready for manual testing.
